source_name: Comparison of fishing efficiency between biodegradable gillnets and conventional nylon gillnets
source_documentation:
Compared two gillnet types and reported CPUE over 43 trials. Used nylon results; ignored novel biodegradable nets.
...,winter season for migrating cod...

effort_models.name: Effort intensity for 27.5x5 m gillnets in terms of square-meter-hours
effort_models.documentation: Assumed mean length of 90cm and used L-W formula of Walsh W(g) = 0.013*L(cm)^2.86 for gutted weight; used FAO equiv of 1.69:1 for live:gutted http://www.fao.org/3/a-bt963e.pdf

gear_models.name: Gear intensity for 200-mm mesh 0.7mm dia monofilament gillnets
gear_models.documentation:
0.7mm monofilament; 0.5 hanging ratio; 200 mm mesh; 27.5m hung length for 275 x 30 meshes
NOTE: This neglects lines, floats, etc which could drastically exceed net weight 0.12+ kg/m2
